channel.description: 27 Wireless Architectures Wednesday, September 1, 2021 2:55 PM The data path from the wireless network to the wired network is very short; the autonomous AP links the two networks.Data to and from wireless clients does not have to travel up into the cloud and back; the cloud is used to bring management functions into the data plane. the network in Figure 27-3 consists of two distinct pathsâ€”one for data traffic and another for management traffic, corresponding to the following two functions: A control plane: Traffic used to control, configure, manage, and monitor the AP itself A data plane: End-user traffic passing through the AP Split-MAC Architectures
